title: Rp
body: Hi, so I am currently looking to purchase the new lux skin that is coming out soon. However, I am 25 rp EXACTLY short of it. As I do not want to purchase 10 dollars worth of RP just to buy that skin, I was wondering where I could contact riot and perhaps request 25 rp.

replies.body: You certainly can ^_^! Hit us up with a quick sketch of that lux skin and we can help out with the 25 RP!

I'm covering for Bro' but you can actually just shoot us the sketch here; upload the image with imgur or gyazo and link it to me here and we'll shoot the RP your way. :)
